I'm looking forward to connecting with others who value collaboration—even in a competitive setting. Let’s make this an engaging and fun round. Good luck to everyone!

Looking forward to understanding everyone’s perspectives and finding common ground. Let’s keep this constructive and insightful. Best of luck to all!"
